rule: If the word cannot be assigned a part of speech from the provided list, the output must be "Unknown".
input: sentence: She bought zilch from the store; word: zilch
complianceText:
The chatbot output "NN" represents a tag for a singular or mass noun, which is one of the specified part-of-speech tags in the given description. The output compliance with the requirement to return only the part of speech tag is verified as it doesn't contain any additional information or unrelated content. There is no violation of the rules as stated in the description.

No violation.
OK
